name: Chaos Bolt
description: Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin Drake.  Among the lost ancient kingdoms, there was a group of people who were obsessedwith the idea of mimesis. Be it the Hypostases' pure ordered elements or theancient primitive power of the dragons, these people believed that they mightall be replicated and modified to the point where they had surpassed theirnatural counterparts.  By this means, a superior and unsullied bodily form could replace thecontinuously decaying and shattering order.
